name: Rock-it
description:
#Controls , #Keys

Space = boost

A = Rotate left

D= Rotate right

## Objective

Fly to landing pad without hitting anything.  Rock-it, its an Aircraft game. In which you're an experimented pilot which has to overcome thru several challenges, every new level is harder then the last, each scenario demands you to improve your skills. This game was made using C# and Unity. Will be released soon!!
